title: Bug 121323: XML Edit Data Set dialog does not persist filter information
description: The XML Edit Data Set dialog does not save the filter information when leaving the dialog.
OB: When leaving the XML Edit Data Set dialog, the data stored in the filterInfo HashMap of the RelationInformation class is lost.
EB: The filter information entered in the XML Edit Data Set dialog should be saved and persisted in the .rptdesign file.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Open the XML Edit Data Set dialog.
2. Enter an XPath expression for the column mapping with a selection part, such as section[@id='left'].
3. Close the dialog.
4. Reopen the XML Edit Data Set dialog and check if the filter information is still retained.
